title: Chaplin's.Goliath.1996.480p.BDRip.AC3.x264-GCJM
description:
Chaplin's.Goliath.1996.480p.BDRip.AC3.x264-GCJM

=======

The life and career of towering Charlie Chaplin screen-villain Eric Campbell is
explored in this documentary featuring rare footage, historical documents, and
interviews with both Campbell's daughter and such noted Chaplin experts as David
Robinson. This look at the life of one of cinema's first screen villains shows
both the remarkable promise and enduring influence of a star whose light was
sadly snuffed out just as it was beginning to shine its brightest.

Be aware :
The first few minutes of the documentary focus on Eric being born in Dunoon,
Scotland. It was later discovered he was born in Altrincham, England.
